posts.post_title: FS:  SGC T205's & T202 LORD / TANNEHILL
posts.post_content:
I have the following T205 cards for sale.  All prices include delivery.  Let me know if you have any questions.

$350.00 -  PSA 4 T202 Lord/Tannehill (currently offered on ebay for $400.00 but offered here for $350.00) - SOLD
$175.00 - SGC 10 Hoblitzell - Correct No Cin - Piedmont Factory 42 - SOLD
$35.00   - SGC A  John Rowan - Piedmont Factory 42 (Bleached on back)
$75.00   - SGC A  Dolly Gray "Stats on Back" - Piedmont 25  - SOLD
$35.00   - SGC 10 David Shean "Cubs" - Hassan 649
$35.00   - SGC 10 George Suggs - paper loss on back
$20.00   - SGC A  Ed Reulbach - Great looking card - SOLD

r/
Frank

PM sent on Hoblitzell.

Cheers,
Geno
I'll take the Dolly Gray if still available.  PM sent.  Thanks!

Good day Geno & Marc,

I have replied to both your inquiries.

r/
Frank

Thank you Geno, Marc & Brett.  Cards were mailed today.  

Added PSA4 T202 Lord/Tannehill $350.00.  (Card is currently on Ebay, so if you want this, let me know and I'll cancel)

Final price reduction on T205's before placement on ebay.

r/
Frank

Thank you.

Email reply was sent and item removed from Ebay.

r/
Frank
